## Dependencies Installation
> httr, jsonlite

* httr
```R
install.package("httr")
```
* jsonlite
```R
install.package("jsonlite")
```

## flexioR Installation  
> From GitHub  

* Stable  
```R
devtools::install_github("flexiooss/flexioR", ref="master")
```
* Unstable  
```R
devtools::install_github("flexiooss/flexioR", ref="develop")
```

## Test installation  
* Load the library
```R
library(flexioR)  
helloworld()
```
